question: J&K Bank launches Sahafat Finance Scheme for __________.
explanation: Jammu and Kashmir Bank launched "J&K Bank Sahafat Finance Scheme", a special financial scheme for journalists of the state.Journalists and employees of media houses in Jammu & Kashmir can avail finance through this scheme for buying cameras, laptops, tablets and books. The loan amount can be in the range ofRs 50000 to Rs 3 lakh, which should be repaid in 60 monthly instalments.
